author: John
title: Daily Afternoon Randomness (52 Photos)
text:
8 9 
At the end of each work day, the Chive community gathers in the DAR to decompress for the day and have a laugh. 
The very first gallery I ever posted on theCHIVE was based on an idea my brother Leo and I had to create a home for the funniest, sexiest, and most heartfelt photos on the internet that day. The best of the best. We called it the Daily Afternoon Randomness , the D.A.R. Exactly 18 people clicked on the first DAR, mostly my parents and relatives. 
It occurred to me today that I’ve never really shown y’all how many people actually click on into the DAR everyday. It’s rather a lot. theCHIVE has surged recently as the last happy refuge on the internet and so too has the DAR. Today, over 1 Million Chivers are in here with you. A community within the community so to speak. The DAR has always been my most favorite thing and I’m proud I get to share it with so many Chivers and Chivettes everyday! 10
